job.title: Full-Stack Engineer
job.description:
Full-Stack Engineer (React/C#/.NET & Node.js/PostgreSQL) - Senior Level with AWS DevOps Expertise

About the Role:
As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer with AWS DevOps mastery, you'll be a critical force in crafting and deploying our MVP Product. 

Responsibilities:
Front-End: 
Develop and maintain dynamic, user-centric interfaces using React and cutting-edge libraries.
Implement clean, maintainable, and testable code following best practices.
Translate UI/UX designs into pixel-perfect reality, fostering exceptional user experiences.
Stay ahead of the curve with evolving React trends and technologies.
Back-End: 
Mastermind architecting and building RESTful APIs in both C# and Node.js, prioritizing code clarity and performance.
Integrate effortlessly with diverse APIs and third-party services.
Design and implement complex business logic and data transformations within backend services.
Craft and optimize PostgreSQL schemas for maximum efficiency and scalability.
DevOps Expertise: 
Design and define AWS infrastructure-as-code using CloudFormation, Terraform, or similar tools.
Implement CI/CD pipelines with automation tools like Jenkins or AWS Code Pipeline.
Configure and manage infrastructure deployments through infrastructure automation practices.
Monitor and troubleshoot cloud infrastructure and applications proactively.
Leverage AWS services like EC2, S3, Lambda, and others to optimize deployments and costs.
General: 
Champion the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering and design to development, testing, and deployment.
Write comprehensive unit and integration tests for both front-end and back-end code.
Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams (designers, product managers, QA) to ensure smooth product development.
Proactively identify and solve technical challenges with innovative solutions.


Qualifications:
Required: 
5+ years of experience as a full-stack engineer.
Strong proficiency in React and related libraries (Redux, Jest, etc.).
Solid understanding of C# and .NET framework/core.
Proven expertise in Node.js and Express framework.
In-depth experience with PostgreSQL database development and optimization.
2+ years of hands-on experience with AWS DevOps tools and services.
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Advantage 
Experience with containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
Knowledge of security and data privacy best practices.
Experience with microservices architecture and API design.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled Full-Stack Engineer to join our team for a 3 to 6-month project. As a Full-Stack Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications. 

Key skills required for this role include expertise in PostgreSQL, .NET Framework, JavaScript, React, and C#. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of database management systems, front-end development, and back-end programming. 

To apply, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to this project. Tell us about your experience with similar projects and how you can help us achieve our goals. We would also appreciate links to any relevant past completed projects that showcase your skills. 

We are excited to work with a talented Full-Stack Engineer who can deliver high-quality work within the specified timeframe.
